item.description:
Brought to you by Erika Salloux, a Certified Professional Organizer® and owner of Living Harmony, LLC (http://www.living-harmony.org) in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

Do you feel like the paper in your home or office is strangling you?  Do you wish you could rid your desk of those distracting piles?  Have you ever found yourself wasting time searching for that project folder you know you put down somewhere?  Come join us for this dynamic opportunity to learn how to eliminate all your spaces of paper clutter forever.

We will cover:

• the three simple, yet powerful, steps to a clutter-free desk

• what kind of paper systems to set up and how to get them going so you trust them enough to use them

• the tricks to maintaining your new system once the organizing is done

Walk away with a set of guiding principles that can last you a lifetime so you are magnificently productive.

Unlike traditional presentations, this one-and-a-half-hour workshop is almost entirely made up of your questions.  Bring to the table the most troublesome paper organizational struggles you face.  Hey, even bring a sampling of your day’s mail.  Using one fortunate participant’s paper baggage, Erika will demonstrate the paper flow system that her clients adore.  She will give you techniques to solve all your challenges on the spot.  Any issue you have been laboring over, others have too.  So start your list now.

Erika will jump-start the event with some essential tips and brainstorming questions like “Where are your time drains?”  And from there we’re off and running with heaps of time devoted to your questions, solving your primary paper challenges.

Everyone will walk away with several simple strategies they can begin the next day to be more focused and productive.

Handouts and worksheets will also be provided.

Any members of this group are welcome to ask at any group meeting for accountability or decluttering partners/buddies--and all non-members are encouraged to join the group.

 

Erika Salloux is a Certified Professional Organizer® who is the founder and president of Living Harmony, LLC (http://www.living-harmony.org), in Cambridge, Massachusetts.  She works with people who want to organize their home or office so they can enjoy life more.  She is an active member of the National Association of Professional Organizers and a member of its Golden Circle.

 

Erika conducts workshops and lectures on many topics, including the holistic approach to getting organized and how to set up a workspace for maximum productivity.  Her signature JetPac© system transforms packing and traveling from stress to simplicity for all kinds of vacationers, trekkers, and business travelers.

 

What some participants have said about Erika’s presentations:

“Thanks so much for a fantastic, inspirational talk.  You rock!”

~ Jeanine Taylor, Snooty Jewelry Owner

~ Marlborough, MA

 

“I really found the handouts most helpful.  And your presentation was clear, specific, and just plain excellent.”

~ Mike Robertson, First Church of Squantum Pastor

~ Squantum, MA

 

“The entire presentation, from the speaker, her outfit, voice, etc. was GREAT.  Coherent, beautiful, and very helpful.”

~ Jadzia Allison

~ Milton, MA

 

*************

 

Date: Tuesday, 11 October 2011

Time: 7 - 8:30 p.m.

Presented by Freeing Our SpaceTime for Optimal Living Meetup

Location: Andala Café

286 Franklin St.

Cambridge, MA  02138

Cost: $25 (This is a stunningly affordable opportunity to learn how to make the fastest progress toward ridding yourself of paper clutter forever.  The handouts and worksheets alone are a $500 value.)

 

Register today.  There are a limited number of spots, and you don’t want to miss out on this exceptional opportunity.  Log on to your PayPal account.  Click on “Send Money.”  In the “To” field, enter jstitt@tekedit.com.  If you don’t have a PayPal account, call Judy Stitt at 617-960-7766 to set one up, or pay **CASH ONLY** at the door (no checks, please: Judy has been charged a stiff bank fee for insufficient funds one too many times now...) - but most likely our event will be sold out by then.
item.how_to_find_us: I will set a Meetup tent sign at our place (at least until the formal meeting begins at 7 pm)

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: How to Organize Your Paper to go from Piles to Productivity
